direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods add HTML content to the element but at different positions (end vs. start).
Both methods add content to the element, but appendElement creates a new element and appends it.
Both methods add content to the element, but prependElement creates a new element and prepends it.
Both methods add text content to the element, but appendText specifically adds a TextNode.
Both methods add text content to the element, but prependText specifically adds a TextNode at the start.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods ensure the presence of child nodes before performing operations.
Clearing existing content before appending new content can be part of the setup.
The resulting HTML content can be verified using the html() method.
